channel.title: Patch Note 0.1.1
channel.description:
[i]Super late, I know. I just realized these were not posted. Whoopsie.[/i]
Hello Scientists! Today we introduce a small patch that resolves some of the recently reported issues. Please find the patch notes below:
Patch Notes:
* Fixed wrong texture being displayed on _mp glock. * Fixed glock idle animation pop. * Replaced $basealphaenvmapmask with $normalmapalphaenvmapmask. * Removed autoaim settings from options. * Fixed zombie hands in singleplayer. * Fixed chargers not working with some savegames. * Disabled autorun by default. * added Single Player Source files in bms/mapsrc. * added bm_mp_environments.vmf in bms/mapsrc.
... we're not joking. Thats all the .vmf's for Black Mesa Single Player. Enjoy :slight_smile:

item.title: Patch Note 0.1.1
item.dc:creator: Medkit
item.description:
… and I was about to ask for a much needed Glock fix.

item.title: Patch Note 0.1.1
item.dc:creator: Fr0z3n
item.description:
Super late, I know. I just realized these were not posted. Whoopsie.

Hello Scientists! Today we introduce a small patch that resolves some of the recently reported issues. Please find the patch notes below:

Patch Notes:

  • Fixed wrong texture being displayed on _mp glock.
  • Fixed glock idle animation pop.
  • Replaced $basealphaenvmapmask with $normalmapalphaenvmapmask.
  • Removed autoaim settings from options.
  • Fixed zombie hands in singleplayer.
  • Fixed chargers not working with some savegames.
  • Disabled autorun by default.
  • added Single Player Source files in bms/mapsrc.
  • added bm_mp_environments.vmf in bms/mapsrc.

… we’re not joking. Thats all the .vmf’s for Black Mesa Single Player. Enjoy

Read full topic
